meanings.definition: A small, round, usually red bump on the skin caused by an infection or irritation.
meanings.sent1: He noticed a pimple forming on his cheek.
meanings.sent2: The pimple was tender to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The pimple looked like a tiny tomato on her face.
meanings.sent4: The pimple stood out like a stop sign on his forehead.
meanings.sent5: The pimple seemed to wink at her from the mirror.
